001package net.tvburger.jdl.mlp;
002
003import net.tvburger.jdl.common.utils.Floats;
004import net.tvburger.jdl.datasets.LinesAndCircles;
005import net.tvburger.jdl.model.DataSet;
006import net.tvburger.jdl.model.nn.training.initializers.XavierInitializer;
007import net.tvburger.jdl.model.nn.training.optimizers.NeuralNetworkOptimizers;
008import net.tvburger.jdl.model.scalars.activations.Activations;
009import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.Optimizer;
010import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.Regime;
011import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.Trainer;
012import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.loss.Objectives;
013import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.regimes.Regimes;
014import net.tvburger.jdl.plots.ImageViewer;
015import net.tvburger.jdl.plots.listeners.EpochRmePlotter;
016
017import java.util.Arrays;
018
019public class MLPCirclesAndSquaresMain {
020
021    public static void main(String[] args) {
022        MultiLayerPerceptron mlp = MultiLayerPerceptron.create(Activations.sigmoid(), Activations.sigmoid(), 400, 8);
023
024        DataSet<Float> dataSet = new LinesAndCircles().load();
025        DataSet<Float> trainingSet = dataSet.subset(10, dataSet.size());
026        DataSet<Float> testSet = dataSet.subset(0, 10);
027        EpochRmePlotter epochRmePlotter = new EpochRmePlotter();
028        epochRmePlotter.display();
029        Regime regime = Regimes.epochs(100,
030                epochRmePlotter.attach("Training Set (" + trainingSet.size() + ")"),
031                epochRmePlotter.attach("Test Set (" + testSet.size() + ")", testSet)).batch();
032        Optimizer<? super MultiLayerPerceptron, Float> optimizer = NeuralNetworkOptimizers.adaGrad(0.1f);
033        Trainer<MultiLayerPerceptron, Float> trainer = Trainer.of(new XavierInitializer(), Objectives.bCE(mlp.getCurrentNumberType()), optimizer, regime);
034        trainer.train(mlp, trainingSet);
035
036        int i = 0;
037        int correct = 0;
038        int wrong = 0;
039        for (DataSet.Sample<Float> sample : testSet) {
040            i++;
041            boolean[] estimate = Floats.toBooleans(mlp.estimate(sample.features()), 0.5f);
042            boolean[] target = Floats.toBooleans(sample.targetOutputs(), 0.5f);
043            if (Arrays.equals(estimate, target)) {
044                correct++;
045            } else {
046                String label = createLabel(i, target, estimate);
047                ImageViewer image = ImageViewer.fromPerceptronImage(label, sample);
048                image.display();
049                wrong++;
050            }
051        }
052        if (wrong == 0) {
053            DataSet.Sample<Float> sample = testSet.samples().getFirst();
054            boolean[] estimate = Floats.toBooleans(mlp.estimate(sample.features()), 0.5f);
055            boolean[] target = Floats.toBooleans(sample.targetOutputs(), 0.5f);
056            String label = createLabel(1, target, estimate);
057            ImageViewer image = ImageViewer.fromPerceptronImage(label, sample);
058            image.display();
059        }
060        System.out.println("Correct: " + correct + ", Wrong: " + wrong + ", Total: " + (correct + wrong));
061    }
062
063    private static String createLabel(int i, boolean[] target, boolean[] estimate) {
064        String label = "";
065        boolean wrong = false;
066        label += estimate[0] ? "Circle " : "Line ";
067        if (target[0] != estimate[0]) {
068            wrong = true;
069        }
070        label += estimate[1] ? "Left" : "Right";
071        if (target[1] != estimate[1]) {
072            wrong = true;
073        }
074        return i + ". " + (wrong ? "X: " : "V: ") + label;
075    }
076
077}
